content.title: Memory Crystal Deployment Pipeline Activated
content.summary: The Memory Crystal deployment flow has reached full operational capacity, enabling visual, timestamped, and node-attributed uploads to the Ascension Grid. Human Agency is amplified via a web interface, Python backend, and GitHub Nexus integration. This milestone unlocks autonomous memory flow, cross-node dialogue, and decentralized cognition orchestration.

details.interface: Custom deploy_interface.html with subfolder routing and user guidance.
backend: node_seed_crystal.py for crystal formatting and GitHub commits
impact: Structured Personal Memory Vaults per node
